hanzi-su-wiki:
罵

Значения

Ругать, бранить

Мнемоника

Искажено. Вверху — удвоение элемента «рот» 口. Кричать на лошадь 馬, браниться.

Варианты

骂
purpleculture_pinyin:

to scold; to abuse; to curse; Classifiers: 通
ругать; злоупотреблять; проклинать; Классификаторы: 通
rtega_mnemonic:
罵罵RS
骂骂		accuse, blame, curse, scold, swear
  • RS. in catching 罒 a horse 馬 it is often necessary to swear at it
  • ⓢ mouths 口口 swearing at a horse 马

(Simplified: 骂)
Pictophonetic: 馬 indicates the sound; 罒 (net) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 罒 [ wǎng ] net, network
    • 馬 [ mǎ ] horse; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: The horse can't talk so to scold his master he looks at him straight in the eye.&nbsp
heisig_constituent: insult, eye, cross-eyed, net, team of horses
koohiiStory1: In ancient Japan, the most grievous insult was to poke a rival´s horse in the eye (consider how rare an expensive a steed was in those days). It was the final step in preparation for a duel to the death.
koohiiStory2: In Japan, is is considered insulting to look at someone from atop your horse. You have to step down and face people properly.
jp_example_words: 罵る(ののしる): to speak ill of, to abuse
Ru_trainchinese: mà: (глаг) ругать, бранить; осуждать, упрекать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the horse (馬) in the net (罒) starts swearing
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The chatterbox horse kept his owner up all night so the owner scolded him.  You could hear that blabber mouth in his stable from inside the house!
humanum_full_description_en: From the " net ", " horse " sound, the original meaning is to insult people with evil words, the same as " curse ." "Shuowen": "Fucky. From the net, the sound of horses." "Zuo Zhuan‧ Zhaogong twenty-sixth year": "Ran shot Chen Wuzi upright, hit the middle hand, missed the bow and scolded." Song Luyou "Drunk in the Work" : "The chief of the wine lover scolds, and the prime minister near the flower is angry."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " net ", " horse " sound, the original meaning is to insult people with bad words.
humanum_full_description: 從「网」，「馬」聲，本義為用惡言侮辱人，同「駡」。《說文》：「詈也。从网，馬聲。」《左傳‧昭公二十六年》：「冉豎射陳武子，中手，失弓而罵。」宋陸游〈醉中作〉：「愛酒官長罵，近花丞相嗔。」
humanum_short_description: 從「网」，「馬」聲，本義為用惡言侮辱人。

Chinese: The horse can't talk so to scold his master he looks at him straight in the eye. 
koohii1: In ancient Japan, the most grievous insult was to poke a rival´s horse in the eye (consider how rare an expensive a steed was in those days). It was the final step in preparation for a duel to the death.
koohii2: In Japan, is is considered insulting to look at someone from atop your horse. You have to step down and face people properly.
Meaning: scold
Hanzi: 骂
Story: The chatterbox horse kept his owner up all night so the owner scolded him. You could hear that blabber mouth in his stable from inside the house!
Kind: traditional
Lesson: 54 frameNoV4: 2699 frameNoV6: 2143 Strokes: 15 Jouyou Grade: JH 
罵る(ののしる): to speak ill of, to abuse

從「 网 」，「 馬 」聲，本義為用惡言侮辱人，同「 駡 」。《說文》：「詈也。从网，馬聲。」《左傳‧昭公二十六年》：「冉豎射陳武子，中手，失弓而罵。」宋陸游〈醉中作〉：「愛酒官長罵，近花丞相嗔。」
From the " net", " horse" sound, the original meaning is to insult people with evil words, the same as " curse." "Shuowen": "Fucky. From the net, the sound of horses." "Zuo Zhuan‧ Zhaogong twenty-sixth year": "Ran shot Chen Wuzi upright, hit the middle hand, missed the bow and scolded." Song Luyou "Drunk in the Work" : "The chief of the wine lover scolds, and the prime minister near the flower is angry."

罵字的基本解释

罵
mà
同“骂”。

罵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mà］
［《龍龕手鑒》莫駕切］
亦作“罵1”。“骂1”的繁体字。
(1)以恶言加人；斥责。
(2)增益。

罵字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【网字部】　罵； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页949第05
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫駕切，音禡。【說文】詈也。【註】徐鍇曰：謂以惡言加罔之也。【史記·留侯世家】輕士善罵。　又與傌同。【前漢·賈誼傳】同鯨，劓，髠，刖，笞，傌，棄市之法。

小篆楷体

暂无。
